dict.acceptation: 后悔，悔恨；遗憾，抱歉；悼念，哀悼；
遗憾，惋惜；后悔，悔恨；哀悼；

sent.orig: Marry a Man never regret, but regret not marry another woman.
sent.trans: 男人从不后悔结婚，只是后悔没有娶另一个女人。

sent.orig: Regret and regret deeply to also follow.
sent.trans: 后悔和悔恨也随之而来。

sent.orig: I regret having to tell you to leave[I regret to have to tell you to leave].
sent.trans: 很抱歉，我现在得叫你走。

sent.orig: A man without a long head would regret what he has done.
sent.trans: 无远见的人将后悔自己所做的事。

sent.orig: We regret our inability to assist you in this matter.
sent.trans: 很遗憾我们在此事上实在无法帮助您，敬请原谅。
